title: Neubofy
description: The 'App Store' for the AI-First generation. A distribution ecosystem designed for student developers who 'Vibe Code'.

sections.title: The Manifesto
sections.content:
### The Problem
We are witnessing the rise of the **'AI-First' Developer**â€”students who can build incredible tools at lightning speed using LLMs. However, they fail at one critical step: **Distribution**.

### The Solution
**Neubofy** bridges this gap. It serves as a specialized, curated marketplace for these high-signal tools. 

> *"You focus on building. We handle the visibility, community trust, and distribution."*

Unlike Product Hunt, which is noisy and generic, Neubofy is laser-focused on student-built AI utilities.

sections.title: Engineering & Architecture
sections.content:
Built for scale and velocity. The platform uses a modern stack to handle high-traffic launches.

- **Frontend**: Next.js 14 (App Router) for SEO and performance.
- **Backend**: Supabase for real-time auth and database capabilities.
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS with a custom 'Midnight Luxury' design system.

We utilized a **Grid Layout** system for maximum information density without clutter, ensuring that every tool gets its moment in the spotlight.
